name: Adam's Trip
description:
Adam's Trip was developed during VIII Edition of Game Jam Alicante (the theme was (in)dependence). The player has to help Adam to fight againt dependence.

Controls:

  • Windows -> Mouse to aim and left click to shoot.
  • Android -> Shoot where the finger taps.

Gamejam website (in Spanish):
http://www.gamejamalicante.com/

Music:
Artist - N3rgul
Track - Smells like LSD
Album - Subspace Cannibals
Source - http://freemusicarchive.org/

Enjoy the game!
